stories.title: Gold Star
stories.text: I got a gold star on my drawing today!

stories.title: Lost Pencil
stories.text: I lost my favorite pencil and can't find it anywhere.

stories.title: Broken Castle
stories.text: My little brother broke my Lego castle that I worked on all day.

stories.title: New School
stories.text: Tomorrow is my first day at a new school and I don't know anyone there.

stories.title: Tying Shoes
stories.text: I've been trying to tie my shoes for a long time but I keep messing up.

stories.title: Reading Time
stories.text: It's Saturday morning and I'm reading my favorite book in my cozy corner.

stories.title: Zoo Trip
stories.text: We're going to the zoo today and I might get to feed the giraffes!

stories.title: Rejected at Recess
stories.text: My friend said she doesn't want to play with me at recess today.

stories.title: Unfair Turn
stories.text: Someone took my turn on the swing even though I was waiting first.

stories.title: Fire Alarm
stories.text: The fire alarm at school was so loud it hurt my ears.

stories.title: Perfect Score
stories.text: I studied hard for my spelling test and got every word right!

stories.title: One Wrong
stories.text: I studied hard for my spelling test, but I still got one word wrong.

stories.title: Blamed Unfairly
stories.text: My teammate blamed me when we lost the game, but it wasn't just my fault.

stories.title: Big Presentation
stories.text: I have a big presentation tomorrow and I'm not sure I remember everything.

stories.title: Math Confusion
stories.text: I've asked my teacher to explain this math problem three times and I still don't get it.

stories.title: Free Afternoon
stories.text: I finished all my homework early and now I have the whole afternoon free.

stories.title: Art Display
stories.text: My art project got chosen to be displayed in the school hallway!

stories.title: Left Out
stories.text: I heard my two best friends making plans without inviting me.

stories.title: Answer Copying
stories.text: Someone keeps copying my answers even though I asked them to stop.

stories.title: Substitute Teacher
stories.text: There's a substitute teacher today and I don't know what the schedule will be.

stories.title: Dog's Greeting
stories.text: My dog was so happy to see me when I got home from school!

stories.title: Sick Grandma
stories.text: My grandma is sick and I can't visit her this weekend.

stories.title: Privacy Invaded
stories.text: My sibling went into my room and used my things without asking.

stories.title: Thunder Storm
stories.text: There's a storm outside with loud thunder and lightning.

stories.title: Computer Wait
stories.text: I've been waiting all day for my turn on the computer but others keep using it.

stories.title: Cloud Watching
stories.text: I'm sitting in my favorite spot watching the clouds go by.

stories.title: Birthday Party
stories.text: Tomorrow is my birthday party and all my friends are coming!

stories.title: Missing Toy
stories.text: My favorite stuffed animal is missing and I looked everywhere.

stories.title: Not Heard
stories.text: Everyone was talking over me at lunch and no one listened to my story.

stories.title: Helping Friend
stories.text: I helped my friend understand their homework and they said thank you.
